text:
Hey, Joey, could
you pass the cheese?
Yeah.
Listen, uh, I'd prefer it
if you didn't call me Joey.

'Cause since I don't
know anyone here

I thought it might
be fun to try out
a cool work nickname.
Hey, Dragon.

Here's your tips
from Monday and Tuesday.
Oh.

Looks like there's, like,
300 bucks in this one.

Yeah, people get pretty
generous around the holidays.

And it never hurts
to wear tight trousers.
Okay.

Could the waiters gather around
to hear tonight's specials?

Okay, first, there's
a Chilean sea bass

prepared with a mango
relish on a bed..

Why is nobody
writing these down?

Because we can
remember them.

And because you're all
gonna make up fake specials

and make me cook 'em like
you did the other night?
Well, sure, that too.

Okay. Forget the specials
for a minute.

Um, alright,
h-here's the thing.

For the last two weeks,
I have, uh..

...tried really hard to create
a positive atmosphere.
Can't hear you.
A positive atmosphere.
But I-I-I've had it up to here.

From now on, it is
going to be my way..
...or the highway, alright?

Does anybody have
a problem with that?
Hey, new guy?
I said..

...does anybody have
a problem with that?
No, ma'am.

Hey, he has a name.
It's Dragon.
You wanna know your name?
Check your hat.
We did the hat, right?
